name: linter-eslint-node
description: Lint JavaScript on the fly, using ESLint (v7 or greater)

scopes.title: List of scopes to run ESLint on
scopes.description: Run `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine the scopes for a file. To lint JavaScript inside HTML files, add `source.js.embedded.html` to this list and be sure that `eslint-plugin-html` is installed and added to your `.eslintrc`.

nodeBin.title: Path to Node binary
nodeBin.description: The path to the version of Node that this linter should run. If you have one global installation of node, `which node` should give you the correct value. If you use NVM or another Node version manager, `which node` within this project's directory should give you the correct value. If you need this value to vary on a per-project basis, consult the README for various options.

warnAboutOldEslint.title: Warn about old ESLint versions
warnAboutOldEslint.description: If your project’s ESLint is too old for this package to support, and you don’t have `linter-eslint` installed, you’ll see a single warning message after your first lint attempt, and no further messages until you reopen the project. If you’d rather not receive the warning under any circumstances, disable this option.

fixOnSave.title: Fix errors on save
fixOnSave.description: Have ESLint automatically apply any fixes when linting on save.

rulesToDisableWhileFixing.title: Disable specific rules from fixes
rulesToDisableWhileFixing.description: Rules in this list will never have fixes applied, whether during a save or when running the `Linter Eslint: Fix File` command.

ignoreFixableRulesWhileTyping.title: Ignore fixable rules while typing
ignoreFixableRulesWhileTyping.description: Ignore all violations that have fixes. Applies to linting that happens due to document changes. Does not apply to lint-on-save.

disableWhenNoEslintConfig.title: Disable when no ESLint config is found
disableWhenNoEslintConfig.description: Will do nothing when no ESLint config is found in either `package.json` or `.eslintrc` instead of showing an error.

rulesToSilenceWhileTyping.title: Silence specific rules while typing
rulesToSilenceWhileTyping.description: Useful when Atom fixes errors on save like `no-trailing-spaces` or `eol-last`.

disableEslintIgnore.title: Disregard .eslintignore
disableEslintIgnore.description: Lint all files, even files mentioned in a project's `.eslintignore` file.

useCache.title: Use Cache
useCache.description: When this package creates an instance of `ESLint`, it will try to re-use that instance when linting other files in your project. If you’re noticing odd behavior, disable this option and reload your window to see if it’s cache-related.
